title: Kenai Fjords National Park: Kayak Touring
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Outfitters and Guides     Kayak Touring                Kayak Touring       The following companies provide experienced guides and all the necessary equipment for your kayak adventure, whether you are looking for an afternoon paddle or a multi-week trip. The Seward Paddling Association is also a resource for those who want to learn about kayaking in the Resurrection Bay and Kenai Fjords area. They encourage everyone to get in touch, learn how to minimize risk, and meet other local paddling enthusiasts!       These companies provide half-day to multi-day trips in Resurrection Bay and Kenai Fjords National Park. Adventure Sixty North P.O.
